casebody.data:
REGAL ELECTRONICS, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. PULSE ENGINEERING, INC., and Full Rise Electronics Co., Ltd., Defendants, and Bel Fuse, Inc., Defendant-Cross Appellant, and Stewart Connector Systems, Inc., Defendant. No. 2006-1294, 2006-1325. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Feb. 28, 2007.

Before NEWMAN, MAYER, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36
